channel.description: i was wondering if any of you knew how to add pvp zones or add minigames to an rsps if you could help me on teamviewer or something i would appreciate that

item.title: 317 how to add wild area's and how to add minigames?
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

Get the north-west and south-east coordinates (to create a box) and add them into the inWild() boolean in your Player class.
